job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to enhancing or refining an AI system, which falls under the broader umbrella of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions participation in AI model fine-tuning, a core activity in the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: Involves combining human and AI elements to create a functional customer support system, suggesting software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies implies the development and initial implementation phases of software.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on improving existing AI systems and integrating them into customer support workflows, rather than developing novel AI models or building production-grade AI applications from scratch. While it involves AI, it leans more towards operational improvement and application of AI rather than core AI engineering.
